commands.description: Capture a screenshot of the visible tab
Inject javascript code into a chrome tab
Display a prompt to the user that accepts input
Execute a javascript keylogger in a given tab

parameters.hint: Expiration date in number of seconds since the UNIX epoch format. If omitted the cookie becomes a session cookie
parameters.name: expirationDate

parameters.hint: The ID of the cookie store in which to set the cookie. By default, the cookie is set in the current execution context's cookie store.
parameters.name: storeId

parameters.hint: The URL associated with the cookie. If host permissions for this URL are not specified in the manifest file, the API call will fail.
parameters.name: url

parameters.hint: The name of the cookie to remove.
parameters.name: name

parameters.hint: The ID of the cookie store to look in for the cookie. If unspecified, the cookie is looked for by default in the current execution context's cookie store.
parameters.name: storeId

commands.description: retrieve the currently signed in user account
